name: Rainbow Arena
description:
Rainbow Arena is an arena-shooter I worked on for my introduction class to Unity. The player is challenged to defeat ever-increasing waves of enemies in a randomly generated arena. Use the double-jump to gain the upper hand, and beat your own highscore!

Controls:

WASD - walk/run
Space - (double)-jump
R - reload
Q - drop weapon
E - pick up weapon
P - reload game (mainly for debugging)
